text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, right. Thanks for the reminder, I'll have 
to update my documents with the details.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Well, age is important for research. Significantly, 
time changes one's physical body, so it's important 
to keep a daily record of these changes.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Are you sure, you don't wanna have a... birthday 
celebration?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Mm? I guess not… I'll at least take a gift, but I don't 
see the need for one in the first place.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's have a birthday party!! I'm gonna go 
gather everyone now!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
No, listen. I like it when the subjects of my research 
gather together, but it's hard to do any research if 
everyone's eyes are on me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'll also prepare lots of food and drinks. Oh, and I 
already have a present for you. I hope you're looking 
forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to make this the best birthday party 
you've ever had!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
…I've always wondered if your eagerness and 
inability to listen to others is something you 
inherited from your parents.
